lyric.verse: Hutari de mezasu shika mo betsubetsu ni Yakusoku no oka e isogu Ainaki sekai sono uragawa wo Toritsukuroo tame ni damasu kimi wo Yotsubai aishi autame Hirumanai taikooshiuru tame ni Kimi wa utau anshin wo kattatte Ore mo hoshii kokoro kara Namida no yukue doo demo ii kai Boku wa hiroo yo kizutsukanai yoo ni
